com.gilran.chess.android

Class SquareAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.gilran.chess.android.SquareAdapter

  • public class SquareAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    A square adapter for a chess board grid view.
